personal.name: Ajinkya Taranekar
personal.title: Software Development Engineer 2
personal.tagline: Full Stack Engineer | GenAI Specialist | Tech Leader
bio: I'm a Polyglot Software Engineer with 3+ years of hands-on experience architecting scalable, data-intensive applications in fast-paced startup environments, where I've worn multiple hats from full-stack development and SRE to GenAI R&D, gaining broad exposure across technologies like Java, Python, Go, and cloud-native tools.

Proven in driving innovation, such as integrating GenAI to slash latencies by 90% and onboarding times from weeks to minutes, while mentoring teams to accelerate development cycles by 75%. Recognized for strong ownership and accountability in high-impact and leveraged projects, including resolving 1,400+ P0 alerts at 91.7% efficiency.

I bring a collaborative culture that emphasises agile practices, cross-functional leadership, and reliable delivery of enterprise-grade solutions. A gold medalist in Computer Science, I relocated to Dublin in September 2025 to pursue an MSc in Computer Science at Trinity College Dublin, blending technical depth with strategic vision to transform fintech and emerging tech landscapes.
I believe in being a Karma Yogi, valuing culture, knowledge, and impact more than rewards.

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer 2
experiences.description: Spearheaded R&D for VoiceBot SDKs in digital banking, integrating cutting-edge GenAI frameworks and building scalable enterprise solutions. Mentored a team of 3 interns in Java backend development, instilling industry best practices and modern Agile workflows.
highlights: Built Go + gRPC-based Agent Management System, reducing agent onboarding time to 5 minutes
Designed in-house search engine with semantic vector and fuzzy search, cutting retrieval latency from 1s ‚Üí 150ms
Architected Svelte micro-frontend migration (mobile-first to desktop), eliminating 50K lines of rework across 5 modules
Developed GDPR-compliant analytics engine monitoring RoPA events for 100K+ daily active users
Pioneered Figma LLM plugin for heatmaps and copy optimisation, accelerating design reviews from weeks ‚Üí days

experiences.title: Full-Stack Developer
experiences.description: Built and scaled multi-tenant CMS for UHNI Ecosystem (India & MEA), leading cross-functional teams to deliver enterprise-grade retail banking solutions. Acted as Reliability Engineer, managing critical production incidents and ensuring zero DR failures.
highlights: Automated onboarding of 300+ products across 15 categories, reducing bank onboarding from weeks ‚Üí 1 week
Engineered Atomic Design templating system for fully white-label customisation across UHNI platform
Implemented ClickHouse for analytics, reducing report generation from hours ‚Üí 30 seconds
Managed 1,400+ P0 alerts with 91.7% resolution rate (avg. ack 2.8 min; record 50 sec)
Boosted Flights & Hotels performance by 90% with Svelte micro-frontends
Developed core NPM package reducing development time by 75% across 6 retail banking categories
Led team of 6 to migrate Merchant Marketplace Frontend to Svelte micro-frontend architecture
Enhanced Checkout System supporting 100,000+ daily transactions with advanced payment features

experiences.title: Full-Stack Developer Intern
experiences.description: Optimised reconciliation services for major banks and built robust ETL pipelines. Enhanced system reliability through dynamic visualizations and real-time monitoring solutions.
highlights: Processed 45,000+ daily transactions, reducing manual reconciliation efforts by 95%
Engineered Apache NiFi ETL pipelines, cutting bank onboarding for reconciliation from weeks ‚Üí 1 week
Created dynamic on-call rotation visualisations on Superset
Enhanced OpenSearch and Grafana alerting with real-time CPU and memory insights

experiences.title: Flutter Developer Intern
experiences.description: Developed secure mobile features and interactive UI components for a wealth management app, enhancing security and user engagement across Android and iOS platforms.
highlights: Developed secure mobile app lock and deferred deep linking features
Designed interactive cross-platform UI components improving app responsiveness

experiences.title: Technology Analyst - I (Trainee)
experiences.description: Processed large-scale healthcare data and enhanced search capabilities for improved decision-making and analytics performance.
highlights: Processed and enriched 1.2M+ doctor profiles using advanced data pipelines
Integrated Elasticsearch, reducing API response times by 50%

projects.title: Anti-AI CAPTCHA System
projects.description: Engineered a next-gen CAPTCHA system resilient against modern AI solvers by combining adversarial image generation, behavioural biometrics, browser fingerprinting, and proof-of-work throttling. Built full-stack attacker simulation pipelines to benchmark models like OCR, CNN/CTC, and LLM-guided attacks‚Äîdemonstrating strong resistance under real adversarial stress.

projects.title: AI Toolkit ‚Äì PostgreSQL Extension for Natural-Language Querying
projects.description: Developed a PostgreSQL extension enabling natural-language querying, SQL error explanation, and schema-aware reasoning directly inside the database. Added multi-provider LLM support and a pluggable 'database memory' layer for context-rich responses‚Äîmaking analytics dramatically more accessible for analysts and product teams.

projects.title: Convo AI - VoiceBot Agent Management System
projects.description: Spearheaded R&D for VoiceBot SDKs in digital banking by integrating cutting-edge GenAI frameworks, delivering a Go + gRPC-based Agent Management System that slashed agent onboarding time to 5 minutes. Built for scalable, enterprise-grade digital banking solutions.

projects.title: In-House Search Engine (Part of Convo AI)
projects.description: Designed & built an in-house search engine combining semantic vector and fuzzy search, streamlining data orchestration and cutting retrieval latency from 1s to 150ms. Implemented for high-performance data retrieval in production systems.

projects.title: Dailify - Curbside Pickup Service
projects.description: Developed a curbside pickup service for Indian grocery stores to enable real-time inventory tracking and provide a convenient grocery pickup option for commuters. Implemented a microservices architecture using Spring Boot with a CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions on an Azure VM. Designed and executed end-to-end data ingestion and processing pipelines using ETL for inventory analysis, reducing query times by 85% by integrating Elasticsearch.

projects.title: Department Information System
projects.description: Built a mobile app with over 30+ interactive screens for the Computer Science department, enabling faculty and students to track and retrieve tasks and reports, improving efficiency by 60%. Utilised microservices in Spring Boot, automating CI/CD with GitHub Actions to streamline deployment and maintenance.

projects.title: FinnEasy - Gamified Stock Market Solution
projects.description: Recognised as Best in Fintech at Hackitout for building 'FinnEasy,' a digital gamified stock market solution to streamline financial planning. Awarded among 50+ teams for innovation in fintech.

projects.title: M.I.T.R.A - Credit Worthiness Tool
projects.description: 2nd Runner-Up at TVS Credit EPIC Season 2. Developed 'M.I.T.R.A,' a credit-worthiness measuring tool for TVS Credit, focusing on innovation in data-driven inventory management for retail business persons.
projects.winner: 2nd Runner-Up at TVS Credit EPIC Season 2
